caseTitle: Pakistan Railways thr. its Chief Executive Officer/Senior General Manager, Lahore & another v. Muhammad Aslam
tagline: (1) Doctrine of locus poenitentiae in our judicial system. (2) Legal maxim “actio personalis moritur cum persona” the personal right to an action dies with the person. (3) In case of survival of cause of action,  the legal representatives may be impleaded to continue the legal proceedings under Order XXII, Rule 1, C.P.C.
